channel.title: Kulinarian Blog: Food, Recipes, and Tech
channel.description: Articles on food, recipes, and tech from the creators of Kulinarian.com

item.title: Squarespace Vs Wordpress For Food Blogs
item.description: If you’re taking the steps to create your first recipe website or food blog, you will quickly discover the plethora of website building and platform choices. It’s a daunting task to sort through the complex options, and many would be bloggers give up after hours of searching and testing out free trials.
item.dc:creator: Kulinarian

item.title: A Classic Tale Of A Software Developer Attempting UX Design
item.description: User experience design is hard. And as a software developer, I did what all developers do when they attempt UX design... they assume their users will instinctively know how to use their product. I expected the user to intuitively know how my interfaces will work and why an interface needed to function the way it did.
item.dc:creator: Kulinarian

item.title: Kulinarian.com Users Asked For A New Website... So We Built It
item.description: We’re happy to announce that the features our users have been asking for are finally live and ready to use. The first thing you will immediately notice is the entire site design, layout, and style has been completely redone.
item.dc:creator: Kulinarian
